de.cocolab.reuse
Interface HasPosition

All Known Implementing Classes:
Position
public interface HasPosition

This interface specifies a position method which returns an object of type Position. Classes representing objects which have a source code position should implement this interface. The main use of this is in rex scanners.

Version:
$Id: $

Method Summary
 Position position()
          Return the source position of this object.
 

Method Detail

position

public Position position()
Return the source position of this object.

Returns:
a Position object describing the origin of this object in terms of a source file.
